thread.title: Amazing Customer Service
thread.title_full: Amazing Customer Service - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Chilli99_12
title: Amazing Customer Service
text: My husband booked The Goring Hotel for a long weekend and as soon as we arrived the staff were absolutely amazing. The d√©cor is stunning and we relaxed in the bar before we went out for the evening. Its not often you go somewhere and receive such excellent customer service.
